com.commercetools.sunrise.cms.contentful

Class ContentfulCmsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sunrise.cms.contentful.ContentfulCmsService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmsService

    public class ContentfulCmsService
extends java.lang.Object
implements CmsService
    Service providing access to CMS pages from Contentful platform.

    Instance of the service is created per Contentful page type and one of this type's fields upon which query will be executed. A consequence of that is that content should be uniquely identified by chosen field. If there is more than one entity of chosen type with the same query field Contentful will return all of them but this service will result in CompletableFuture completed by throwing CmsServiceException informing about non-unique identifier used.

    Contentful's JVM executor is synchronous and for that reason this service is built with additional Executor parameter to provide its user with control over execution context in which requests are executed.

      • page

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<CmsPage>> page(java.lang.String pageKey,
                                                                              java.util.List<java.util.Locale> locales)
        Get the page content corresponding to the given key.
        Specified by:
        page in interface CmsService
        Parameters:
        pageKey - identifying the page
        locales - for the localized content inside the page
        Returns:
        a CompletionStage containing the page content identified by the key, or absent if it could not be found, or a CmsServiceException if there was a problem when obtaining content

      • of

        public static ContentfulCmsService of(java.lang.String spaceId,
                                      java.lang.String token,
                                      java.lang.String pageType,
                                      java.lang.String pageQueryField,
                                      java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor)
        Create new instance of ContentfulCmsService based on Contentful account credentials.
        Parameters:
        spaceId - Contentful space ID
        token - access token to given space
        pageType - Contentful model's page type to be queried against
        pageQueryField - pageType field against which query will be run
        callbackExecutor - defines execution context in which requests are executed
        Returns:
        instance of this service ready to serve content based on given configuration
